definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]

sentences.chinese: 大概你要花十到十五英鎊。

sentences.english: Berlin estimates it lost a record five million euros last year to fare dodgers.
sentences.chinese: 柏林估計它去年由於逃票人造成了五百萬英鎊的損失。

sentences.english: He won 1000 pounds in last night's play.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天晚上賭贏了1000英鎊。

sentences.english: Its original cost is estimated to have been about 100 pounds in today's prices.
sentences.chinese: 這個餅乾盒的原價摺合到今天賣預估是100英鎊。
這頓飯花了本人們30英鎊。
於是他們放棄了英鎊的可兌換性。

sentences.english: Ive come to inquire about a five-thousand-pound remittance from London.
sentences.chinese: 我來查問一筆從倫敦匯來的五千英鎊匯款。

sentences.english: If you bought this tea-set in Oxford Street, it would cost you ￡14 at least!
sentences.chinese: 如果你在牛津街買這套茶具，你至少得化14英鎊。

sentences.english: Red wolves may eat 2 to 5 pounds of food per day when prey is abundant.
sentences.chinese: 紅狼在食物充足的時候每天要喫2到5英鎊食物。

sentences.english: I got this Beatles CD in the second-hand shop for a pound.
sentences.chinese: 這張甲殼蟲樂隊的CD在二手店才賣一英鎊。

sentences.english: Jobic gave Mr. Mornant the bag, but he would not take the five pounds.
sentences.chinese: 若比把包給了摩赫南先生，但是他不要那五英鎊。
你拿來那張一百萬英鎊的鈔票了嗎？

sentences.english: The dishonest manager defrauded the company of millions of pounds.
sentences.chinese: 這個不誠實的經理詐取了公司幾百萬英鎊。

sentences.english: My bank statement shows a balance of 150 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 我的銀行結單顯示結存150英鎊。

definition: to value/to appraise/to be valued at/estimate/valuation
expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
